content:
It sounds like you have a great approach to maintaining your collection, and it's wonderful that you're enjoying your vintage video game cartridge collection as well! Earthworm Jim is a classic game, and it's fantastic that you were able to find a near-mint condition copy.

Spider-Man and X-Men are iconic series, and it's great that you're also exploring newer titles like Saga and Black Hammer. Saga, in particular, has received widespread critical acclaim for its unique storytelling and artwork.

Your approach to maintaining your collection is spot on. Setting aside a little time each week to tidy up and ensure everything is in its place can make a big difference in the long run. It's also great that you're handling your comics with care and avoiding stacking them too high to prevent damage.

As for your video game cartridge collection, it's exciting that you're working on completing it. Earthworm Jim is a great addition, and it's wonderful that it's in near-mint condition and works perfectly on your retro console. Do you have a favorite aspect of collecting vintage video games, such as the hunt for rare titles or the nostalgia of playing classic games?

Also, have you considered displaying your vintage video game cartridges in a special way, such as on a shelf or in a display case? It can be a great way to showcase your collection and add a touch of nostalgia to your gaming setup.
